attributes.action: Ending of Atos Medical Assessments and disclosing how much Atos receive for signing claimants fit for work
attributes.additional_details:
A report by the Citizens Advice Bureau stated that the Atos Medical Assessments were not fit for purpose and many people with medical conditions and serious disabilities were being told they were fit for work contary to medical advice from their own consultants
People with mental health problems being assessed by people not qualified to do so.
